text: Aur tum sarkaon per iss gharz say nahi betha kero kay Allah per eman laney walay ko dhamkiyan do aur Allah ki raah say roko aur iss mein kuji ki talash mein lagay raho. Aur uss halat ko yaad kero jabkay tum kum thay phir Allah ney tum ko ziyada ker diya aur dekho kay kaisa anjam hua fasaad kerney walon ka
